title: Pessat fee seat without exam.
content: Can anyone help me getting seat in pes with pessat fee quota I will give them commission if needed my budget is around 5 lakhs per annum n I am not confident of getting pessat or any other exams please help me out

comments.body:
Dude, there's still time for entrances. Your time and efforts are better spent focusing on your prep rather than having unrealistic ideas like this. 

The only way you can get into PES is either through KCET, PESSAT, JEE Mains or management quota, each of them having their own respective fees. Nobody can just offer you a PESSAT fee seat out of nowhere.

Hardly 20 days for kcet bro daily anxiety n stress is killing me, with infulence you can get with pessat fee soo just trying for that


I am a dropper n I had a health issue soo
I am not even able to sleep for an hour a day

I'm sorry to hear about your health issues and I hope you get better soon but it doesn't change the fact that the only way to get a PESSAT seat is to give the PESSAT exam. Every person who gives the test is given a rank and only they can participate in counseling. Unless you find a way to magically assign yourself a rank without appearing for PESSAT, the only way you can pay your way into PES is by opting for management quota. 

That's the harsh reality, whether you like it or not.
